attributes.action: Make it mandatory for bicycle users to have sufficient third party insurance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motorists and pedestrians alike are at risk of physical and financial loss due to accidents and damages caused by bicycle users. It is time that bicycle  users have sufficient insurances of at least third party public liability, as do all other road users, to cover any eventuality of a claim against them due to any damages they cause, as another user of our roads. Motor vehicle drivers should not have to be penalised through making a claim on their own insurances for the damages caused by bicycle users, both minor or adult.
